data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 7, Hiroshima's Leandro Pereira has run offside.
Sapporo's Jay Bothroyd is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 9, Sapporo are coming forward and Lucas Fernandes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sapporo's Daiki Suga misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 15, Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jay Bothroyd's header is off-target for Sapporo.
In the minute 18, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Hiroshima.
Hiroshima were awarded a penalty ... Which Rhayner failed to convert!
Rhayner hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Hiroshima.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Hiroshima.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Sapporo takes a corner from the left.
Sapporo drive upfield and Jay Bothroyd gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hiroshima defender.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Sapporo defenders.
In the minute 30, Hayao Kawabe of Hiroshima gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
Free kick Sapporo.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Hiroshima.
Akito Fukumori (Sapporo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Hiroshima.
Rhayner (Hiroshima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 38, Sapporo are coming forward and Daiki Suga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Akito Fukumori (Sapporo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Leandro Pereira is booked for the away team.
Anderson Lopes of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Hiroshima at Sapporo.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Sapporo.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
Yusuke Chajima is on a sub for Rhayner for Hiroshima.
Free kick Sapporo.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Sapporo.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Sapporo.
Douglas Vieira scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Yoshifumi Kashiwa.
Free kick Sapporo.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Sapporo.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Sapporo make their first substitution with Tomoki Takamine replacing Takuma Arano.
The home team replace Anderson Lopes with Takuro Kaneko.
In the minute 57, Kazuki Fukai is replacing Hiroki Miyazawa for the home team.
The home team replace Akito Fukumori with Ryosuke Shindo.
Hiroshima's Leandro Pereira misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Sapporo pushes forward through Takuro Kaneko, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sapporo are coming forward and Tomoki Takamine gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Yuya Asano is replacing Tsukasa Morishima for the away team.
Hiroshima make their third substitution with Shunki Higashi replacing Douglas Vieira.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 68, Sapporo takes a corner from the right.
Douglas is on a sub for Yoshiaki Komai for Sapporo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Sapporo.
In the minute 76, Can Sapporo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Sapporo drives forward and Tomoki Takamine gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 78, Free kick Hiroshima.
Takuro Kaneko (Sapporo) has received a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 80, Hiroshima make their fourth substitution with Kodai Dohi replacing Yoshifumi Kashiwa.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Sapporo.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 83, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Leandro Pereira.
Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Leandro Pereira for Hiroshima is back on the field again.
In the minute 86, Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Hiroshima.
Sho Sasaki (Hiroshima) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 88, Daiki Suga (Sapporo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Yuya Asano extends Hiroshima's lead to 0-2.
Akira Ibayashi (Hiroshima) has replaced the possibly injured Leandro Pereira.
Daiki Suga (Sapporo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
